function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Air pollutants serving as airborne vectors for virus transmission","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases in built environments","Mitigation":"Improving indoor air quality, implementing air filtration systems, and minimizing outdoor pollutant levels","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and outdoor pollutant monitoring devices","People":"General public, residents, and occupants of built environments","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities, and environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Positive correlation between respiratory illness and chronic exposure to air pollutants","Impact":"Elevated risk of respiratory illness and susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Reducing air pollutant levels, promoting respiratory health, and implementing public health interventions","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring devices, emission controls, and public health campaigns","People":"Resident populations, particularly those in urban areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and environmental regulators"},{"Description":"Presence of virus fragments in particulate matter","Impact":"Potential transmission of virus through contaminated particulate matter","Mitigation":"Enhancing particulate matter control, improving ventilation, and implementing strict infection control measures","Technologies":"Particulate matter filtration systems, ventilation control devices, and rapid virus testing kits","People":"Residents and healthcare workers in affected areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare facilities, and environmental agencies"}]}
